content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":143091,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひ、ひどい……こんな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-this is terrible... like this...\""},{"lineNumber":143092,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ――ぎゃ！　熱い熱い熱いぃぃぃいいいい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hii—gya! Hot, hot, hooooot!\""},{"lineNumber":143093,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやぁああ！　た、助けて、誰かァ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nooo! H-help, someone!\""},{"lineNumber":143094,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いやだぁ！　やべ！　やめてくれェ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nooo! Damn it! Stop it!\""},{"lineNumber":143095,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヒイィィイィイイイイ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hiiiii!"},{"lineNumber":143096,"originalJapaneseLine":"荒れ狂う波のように逆巻く炎が","translatedEnglishLine":"Flames billowing turbulently like raging waves"},{"lineNumber":143097,"originalJapaneseLine":"村人に猛威を振るい悲鳴が響く。","translatedEnglishLine":"wreak havoc on the villagers as screams echo."},{"lineNumber":143098,"originalJapaneseLine":"炎はぐるりと村全体を包み、","translatedEnglishLine":"The flames engulf the entire village,"},{"lineNumber":143099,"originalJapaneseLine":"村人の逃げ場はもうどこにもない。","translatedEnglishLine":"leaving the villagers with nowhere left to run."},{"lineNumber":143100,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はーっはははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha—hahaha!"},{"lineNumber":143101,"originalJapaneseLine":"　逃げろ逃げろ！　焼け死ぬぞォ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Run, run! You'll burn to death!\""},{"lineNumber":143102,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひひひひひ！　お、おい、見ろよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehehehe! H-hey, look!\""},{"lineNumber":143103,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、あ、あ、あの間抜けな姿！　ぶははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"That dumb look over there! Bwahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":143104,"originalJapaneseLine":"村を囲むは魔軍。","translatedEnglishLine":"The village is surrounded by a demon army."},{"lineNumber":143105,"originalJapaneseLine":"必死に逃げ惑う村人達を笑い、","translatedEnglishLine":"They laugh at the desperately fleeing villagers,"},{"lineNumber":143106,"originalJapaneseLine":"更に火をくべていく。","translatedEnglishLine":"and add more fire to the blaze."},{"lineNumber":143107,"originalJapaneseLine":"「兵同士が殺し合うなら分かる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I understand if soldiers kill each other."},{"lineNumber":143108,"originalJapaneseLine":"　時には民が巻き込まれることもあるでしょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sometimes civilians get caught in the crossfire too."},{"lineNumber":143109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、民を殺す為に動く軍なんて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"But an army that acts to kill civilians...\""},{"lineNumber":143110,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":143111,"originalJapaneseLine":"軽く唇を噛んだ愛が顔を上げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ai lightly bites her lip and looks up."},{"lineNumber":143112,"originalJapaneseLine":"「謙信様、ここは抑えて下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Kenshin, please hold back here.\""},{"lineNumber":143113,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いや、私は」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No, I am—\""},{"lineNumber":143114,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前ら見ろ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, look!"},{"lineNumber":143115,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ようやく人間の軍が来やがったぜ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Finally, the human army has arrived!\""},{"lineNumber":143116,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待ってたぜぇ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We've been waiting for you!\""},{"lineNumber":143117,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この村の奴らだけじゃ足りなかったんだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"The folks from this village alone weren't enough!\""},{"lineNumber":143118,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、俺らが来るってバレバレだったのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, it was obvious we were coming, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":143119,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……外道め」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You bastards.\""},{"lineNumber":143120,"originalJapaneseLine":"刀を抜き放ち、謙信が魔軍に向け歩を進める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin draws his sword and strides toward the demon army."},{"lineNumber":143121,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こら待て！　敵が多すぎる！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, wait! There are too many enemies!"},{"lineNumber":143122,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここは一旦退くぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's retreat for now!\""},{"lineNumber":143123,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……すみません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I'm sorry."},{"lineNumber":143124,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ですが――」","translatedEnglishLine":"But—\""},{"lineNumber":143125,"originalJapaneseLine":"「助けを求める人がいる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There are people asking for help.\""},{"lineNumber":143126,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ！　行ってしまった！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah! They've gone!\""},{"lineNumber":143127,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ、仕方ないわね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, it can't be helped.\""},{"lineNumber":143128,"originalJapaneseLine":"「者共、謙信様に遅れるな！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone, don't fall behind Lord Kenshin!"},{"lineNumber":143129,"originalJapaneseLine":"　突撃ーーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Charge---!\""},{"lineNumber":143130,"originalJapaneseLine":"「仕方ない俺達も行くぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No choice, we're going too!"},{"lineNumber":143131,"originalJapaneseLine":"　謙信を死なせるな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't let Kenshin die!\""},{"lineNumber":143132,"originalJapaneseLine":"「毘沙門天の加護ぞある！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We have Bishamonten's protection!\""},{"lineNumber":143133,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひいっ！？　なんだこの女！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!? What is with this woman?!"},{"lineNumber":143134,"originalJapaneseLine":"　恐ろしく強ぇぞ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"She's terrifyingly strong!\""},{"lineNumber":143135,"originalJapaneseLine":"「か、数だ！　数で押せェ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-it's numbers! Overwhelm them with numbers!"},{"lineNumber":143136,"originalJapaneseLine":"　物量で押し潰せ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Smother them with sheer force!\""},{"lineNumber":143137,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんッッッッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph!\""},{"lineNumber":143138,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信がクルリと舞うように体を回転させ、","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin spins his body like a dance,"},{"lineNumber":143139,"originalJapaneseLine":"遠心力のたっぷり乗った一撃を放つ。","translatedEnglishLine":"and delivers a strike full of centrifugal force."},{"lineNumber":143140,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐげっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gugeh...!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ――ぎゃ！　熱い熱い熱いぃぃぃいいいい！」
「いやぁああ！　た、助けて、誰かァ！」
「いやだぁ！　やべ！　やめてくれェ！
ヒイィィイィイイイイ！」
荒れ狂う波のように逆巻く炎が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flames billowing turbulently like raging waves

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人に猛威を振るい悲鳴が響く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: wreak havoc on the villagers as screams echo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 炎はぐるりと村全体を包み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The flames engulf the entire village,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人の逃げ場はもうどこにもない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: leaving the villagers with nowhere left to run.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げろ逃げろ！　焼け死ぬぞォ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Run, run! You'll burn to death!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひひひひひ！　お、おい、見ろよ！
あ、あ、あ、あの間抜けな姿！　ぶははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That dumb look over there! Bwahaha!"
The village is surrounded by a demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必死に逃げ惑う村人達を笑い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They laugh at the desperately fleeing villagers,
and add more fire to the blaze.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「兵同士が殺し合うなら分かる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I understand if soldiers kill each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時には民が巻き込まれることもあるでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes civilians get caught in the crossfire too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、民を殺す為に動く軍なんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But an army that acts to kill civilians..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軽く唇を噛んだ愛が顔を上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ai lightly bites her lip and looks up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「謙信様、ここは抑えて下さい」
ようやく人間の軍が来やがったぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, the human army has arrived!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この村の奴らだけじゃ足りなかったんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The folks from this village alone weren't enough!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、俺らが来るってバレバレだったのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, it was obvious we were coming, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刀を抜き放ち、謙信が魔軍に向け歩を進める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin draws his sword and strides toward the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こら待て！　敵が多すぎる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, wait! There are too many enemies!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信がクルリと舞うように体を回転させ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin spins his body like a dance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠心力のたっぷり乗った一撃を放つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and delivers a strike full of centrifugal force.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

「いやだぁ！　やべ！　やめてくれェ！
ヒイィィイィイイイイ！」
荒れ狂う波のように逆巻く炎が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flames billowing turbulently like raging waves

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人に猛威を振るい悲鳴が響く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: wreak havoc on the villagers as screams echo.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 炎はぐるりと村全体を包み、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The flames engulf the entire village,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人の逃げ場はもうどこにもない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: leaving the villagers with nowhere left to run.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げろ逃げろ！　焼け死ぬぞォ！」

あ、あ、あ、あの間抜けな姿！　ぶははは！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That dumb look over there! Bwahaha!"
The village is surrounded by a demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必死に逃げ惑う村人達を笑い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They laugh at the desperately fleeing villagers,
and add more fire to the blaze.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I understand if soldiers kill each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、民を殺す為に動く軍なんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But an army that acts to kill civilians..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ai lightly bites her lip and looks up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「謙信様、ここは抑えて下さい」
ようやく人間の軍が来やがったぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, the human army has arrived!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この村の奴らだけじゃ足りなかったんだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The folks from this village alone weren't enough!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちっ、俺らが来るってバレバレだったのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, it was obvious we were coming, huh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 刀を抜き放ち、謙信が魔軍に向け歩を進める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin draws his sword and strides toward the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こら待て！　敵が多すぎる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, wait! There are too many enemies!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信がクルリと舞うように体を回転させ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin spins his body like a dance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠心力のたっぷり乗った一撃を放つ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and delivers a strike full of centrifugal force.
